All Classes

Class Description
AcceptanceServer
Server that accepts clients, creates new rooms (games) and redirects clients to the specific game server
Action  
ActionsListMsg
Class for sending to the client a list of actions that can be performed
BasicPower
Basic implementation of power class
BasicPowerTest  
Board
Class that manages the game board and gives access to the cells
BoardTerrainContainer
Class for draw the gameterrain, bg and workers on the screen
BoardTest  
BuildAgainDecorator
Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
BuildAgainDecoratorTest  
BuildBeforeMoveAgainDecorator
If your worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving
BuildBeforeMoveAgainDecoratorTest  
BuildOption  
BuildUpAgainDecorator
Your worker may build one additional block (not dome), on top of your block
BuildUpAgainDecoratorTest  
Card
Class that represent a card that offer powers to the player
CardDescriptionPanel
This class draw a container for the player's card description
CardGamePanel
This class draw a container for the player's card
CardListDisplayer
Display a single card in CardSelectorScreen
CardSelectorScreen
This class is used in the GUI for choose the cardset or the player card
CardsListMsg
Class for sending to the client a list of cards that can be selected
CardTest  
CardTitlePanel
This class draw a container for the player's card title
Cell
Class that represents a cell of the board Holds references to the tower and worker positioned on it
CellContainer
Used for render a tower under a worker in game
CellDraw
This class represent a cell on the GUI gameboard
CellIcon
this enum define what the cell will render
CellListMsg
Class for a send to the client a list of cell generated by the server
CellTest  
ChooseActionPanel
This class display a dialobox asking to user an action to complete
ChooseBuildPanel
Dialog activate by cards power for build something in a cell
ChooseColorPanel  
ChooseUndoPanel
This class display a panel used by the user for confirm the turn or restart
CLIBoardGenerator
Class used to generate a string representation of the board for the CLI
ClientHandler
Class that handles socket connection with a client
ClientHandlerConnection
Class responsible for the connection with the main server
ClientLauncher
Class responsible for launch the game
CLInterface
CLI interface, manages input and output communication with the user
Color  
CommandHandler  
Constants
Server constants
Controller
Game controller that manages the commands from the clients, send responses and updates the game model
CreatedMsg
Class used to notify the client that a new room has been created
CreateMsg
Class used to pass information to the server for creating a new room
CreateRoomPanel
This class is the panel contained in a JDialog used for define the number of player in the room
Deck
Class that loads cars from file and manages decks for the games
DeckTest  
DialogContent  
DomeAnyLevelDecorator
Your Worker may build a dome at any level.
DomeAnyLevelDecoratorTest  
ExtendedPowerDecorator
Abstract decorator that will be used as interface implemented by each decorator
GamePhase  
GameScreen
This class containes the graphical elements for display the game terrain, worker and card
GameServer
Server that manages a single game on the provided port
GameState
Class that manages games instances, the board, the players and the current turn
GameStateTest  
GenericMessageDialog
this class is a dialogbox for display generic message to the user
GenericMessageScreen
Display on screen a box while the other player join the room
GUinterface
Class for the GUI interface of the game
GUIStatus  
GUIStatusErrorException
Exception for prevent the load of a not existing screen
InvalidMaxPlayersException  
JoinMsg
Class used by the client to join a game providing the selected name
JumpToWinDecorator
You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.
JumpToWinDecoratorTest  
LoadedCard
Class that represent a card loaded from the XML file "Cards.xml"
MenuTextComponent  
Message
Class for general message, server-client-server
MessageHandler
class for reading a generic message from the server and cast it to a specific one for interpretation
MessageTypeNotFoundException
this exception run when he type of message is not defined or not in the list if you run this.... is a problem
MoveAgainDecorator
Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.
MoveAgainDecoratorTest  
MsgCommand
Enumeration of every possible commands that servers and clients can exchange
MsgType
Determines if the message contains system or game command
NextCannotMoveUpDecorator
If one of your workers moved up on your last turn, opponent workers cannot move up this turn
NextCannotMoveUpDecoratorTest  
Observable<T>
Generic Observable class
Observer<T>
Generic Observer class
OptionsListMsg
Class for sending to the client a list of build options that can be selected
OtherLostMsg
Message used to notify clients that a player has lost but the game can continue

Class that represent the player
PlayerInfoMsg
Class used by the client to send initialization information
PlayerNamePanel
This class is the panel contained in a JDialog used for define the the playerName in the room

Point
Class that is used to hold information of a coordinate on the map
PointTest  
PortsManager
Manager of the available ports that are assigned to the game servers
Power
Abstract Power class that will'll be decorated whit decorator pattern
PowerFactory
Class that decorates a power with the decorator indicated by the provided id
PowerFactoryTest  
PushAwayWorkerDecorator
Your worker may move into an opponent worker's space, if their worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level
PushAwayWorkerDecoratorTest  
RequestInfoMsg
Class used by the server to notify the user about the colors and positions that a user can select
Room
Room that holds information about a game
Screen
Class for contain the generic screen settings

Interface for create Screens in the game
